body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**

I find it hard to learn this framework. 

I've read https://docs.temporal.io/docs/temporal-explained/introduction .  This article is very good. 

Then I read about the concepts, like "activity", "worker" etc.  After reading them I don't think I understand them well.  To be honest they just feel like references instead of something that help you understand the framework. 
* It tells people all the parameters that are supported,  instead of focusing on the core roles of the components
* There are lack of real-life examples when a concept is explained - for example,  associate "activity" , "rety" with order processing etc. 

**Describe the solution you'd like**

Some tutorials like those in AWS or in baeldung.com will be great. 

**Describe alternatives you've considered**
Or give a learning path, i.e. a list of documents one can read one by one ? 

**Additional context**
N/A
title: Provide tutorials or a learning path
